dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is a rapidly evolving technology Health technology assessments of telemedicine applications are needed to assist decision makers A few health technology assessment reports and a Cochrane protocol on principles for evaluating telemedicine installations have been published Studies providing evidence on the effectiveness of teleconsultations and teleradiology are summarised Telemedicine shows great promise in some areas however the use of this technology should still be regarded as experimental Therefore it should be implemented in a way that facilitates ongoing evaluation
Tidsskrift for den Norske lægeforening : tidsskrift for praktisk medicin, ny række
